entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, 1.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning late in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
